item.title: The Kooks - Always Where I Need To Be
item.description:
She don’t know
who she is
Oh I can take her
anywhere
Do whatever comes
naturally to you
You know she
just don’t care
You know she
just don’t care
‘Cause I’m
always where
I need to be
and I always thought
I would end up
with you eventually
Do do do do do do
do do do do do do do
Do do do do
do do do do
Now I see
her again
I have to be
a hummingbird
Whisper words
in her ear
Oh now you know
I just don’t care
You know she
just don’t care
‘Cause I’m
always where
I need to be
and I always thought
I would end up
with you eventually
Do do do do do do
do do do do do do do
Do do do do
do do do yeah

Oooh wohwoohwo oh
I’m a man on the scene
I’m a man and
I can be so obscene
Because I always
think I know how to be
But I always
thought I would
End up with you
eventually
Do do do do do do
do do do do do do do
Do do do do
do do do yeah
